title: President gives assent to CrPC (Amendment) Bill 2022
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 30 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Friday gave his assent to the Code of Criminal Procedure (Amendment) Bill 2022.
In the bill, section 195 of the Code of Criminal Procedure 1898 has been amended.
The president gave his assent under Article 75 of the Constitution, a President House press release said.
